rows.label: qst710603_msg0001
rows.name:
Desserts are the best, mo...
Sweet or salty, Morimori
loves them all, mo...

rows.label: qst710603_msg0101
rows.name: Mo mo... I'm really stuffed now, mo...

rows.label: qst710603_msg0102
rows.name:
Everything was so delicious,
mo... Morimori is overwhelmed
with gratitude, mo...

rows.label: qst710603_msg0103
rows.name:
Thanks to eating so many different
things, my knowledge of food and
cooking has grown a lot, mo...

rows.label: qst710603_msg0104
rows.name:
I hope I can find a job
that makes use of this
experience someday, mo...

rows.label: qst710603_msg0105
rows.name:
For example, a job where I travel to
different shops across Alst and explain
the taste of their dishes...

rows.label: qst710603_msg0106
rows.name:
A cooking class where I teach the
recipes of the dishes Morimori has
eaten would be nice too, mo...

rows.label: qst710603_msg0107
rows.name:
No, no, not reports or cooking classes, but
a contest format where I judge the taste
would let me eat a lot of dishes at once...

rows.label: qst710603_msg0108
rows.name:
Mo mo mo... Thinking so hard
has made me hungry again, mo!
Sir, the menu, please, mo!

rows.label: qst710603_msg0201
rows.name:
Not yet, mo! Morimori's second stomach
is as vast as the universe, mo! This
isn't enough to satisfy me, mo!

rows.label: qst710603_msg0202
rows.name:
Especially that shiny, platinum-colored
candy... I can't forget that rich
aroma and taste, mo...
